structure.unit: ARTICLE XLI. ROCKMINING OVERLAY ZONING AREA (ROZA)

text.section:
Sec. 33-425. Zoned Rights-of-Way.
Notwithstanding any provisions of, upon approval of the Director and the Director of the Public Works Department, rights-of-way within the areas described by may be waived and/or a dedication shall not be required, as long as the affected properties are utilized for the uses permitted under of this Article and are not needed for access to non-rockmining properties that are otherwise landlocked. Previously dedicated rights-of-way may be abandoned in accordance with the procedures set forth pursuant to of this Code.
